AddCLSTopicDomains.title: Adding one or more domains to a specified log topic

AddCdnDomain.document: This example shows you how to add an acceleration domain name.
AddCdnDomain.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdn.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: AddCdnDomain
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Origin": {
        "OriginType": "ip",
        "Origins": [
            "1.1.1.1"
        ]
    },
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "Domain": "www.test.com",
    "ServiceType": "web",
    "Area": "mainland"
}
AddCdnDomain.title: Adding an acceleration domain name

DescribeCdnDomainLogs.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdn.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeCdnDomainLogs
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Domain": "www.test.com",
    "EndTime": "2019-09-04 12:00:00",
    "StartTime": "2019-09-04 00:00:00"
}

PurgePathCache.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdn.tencentcloudapi.com

X-TC-Action: PurgePathCache
<Common request parameters>

        "http://www.test.com/test/"

UpdateDomainConfig.document: This example shows you how to update domain name configurations.
UpdateDomainConfig.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: cdn.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: UpdateDomainConfig
<Common request parameters>

{
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "Domain": "www.test.com"
}
UpdateDomainConfig.title: Updating domain name configurations
